name: horror Life Ride
description: Verification will take place when required based on theme park attendance. Children under the age of 12 are not required to show proof of vaccination or a negative test result.

name: Pendulum Ride
description: Pendulum rides are amusement rides based on the motion of a fixed pendulum. The configuration of the ride consists of a gondola, arm, and an axle.

name: Light Launch Ride
description: The launched roller coaster is a modern form of roller coaster. A launched coaster initiates a ride with high amounts of acceleration.

name: Free Windwood Ride
description: Windwood started off the new year with a great turnout for riding camp .This past week the Windwood team had the first opportunity to free jump him.

name: Theme Park Ride
description: Browse our thrill rides, water rides & family theme park attractions. Plan your day, check height restrictions & explore our record-breaking rollercoasters.

name: Spinning Gravity Ride
description: The ride is completely enclosed, with 48 padded panels lining the inside wall. Riders lean against these panels, which are angled back.
